properties.areaDesc: Union, KY; Gallatin, IL; Hardin, IL; Crittenden, KY
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 11 at 10:14AM CST until January 20 at 8:00PM CST by NWS Paducah KY
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Paducah, Kentucky has issued a
flood warning for the following river in Illinois...Kentucky...

Ohio River at Shawneetown

.Heavy rainfall along the Ohio and Wabash Rivers will cause water
levels to rise at Shawneetown. Minor flood stage is forecast to be
reached Wednesday morning with a crest of 36.1 feet Friday night.
Afterwards, the river is forecast to slowly fall.

The National Weather Service in Paducah, Kentucky has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Ohio River at Shawneetown.
* from late Tuesday night to Monday January 20.
* At  9:30 AM Saturday the stage was 30.9 feet.
* Flood Stage is 33.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by Wednesday morning and
continue to rise to near 36.1 feet by Friday night.
* Impact...At 33.0 Feet...Minor flooding occurs affecting mainly
bottomland and surrounding low lying areas.
properties.instruction:
SAFETY MESSAGE...

Never drive cars...trucks or sport utility vehicles through flooded
areas. The water may be too deep to allow safe passage. Never allow
children to play in or near flood waters. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather
Radio or your local media for further statements and possible updated
forecasts.

Additional information is available at
http://www.crh.noaa.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=pah /lower case/
